wikipedia_page.main: William Whelan (20 February 1906 – 1982) was a Scottish footballer who played as a full back or wing half. He played for junior clubs in Scotland and for Sunderland, Southend United and Darlington in the English Football League.

response: William Augustine Whelan (1 April 1935 – 6 February 1958), also known as Billy Whelan or Liam Whelan, was an Irish footballer and one of the eight Manchester United players who were killed in the Munich air disaster. He was 22 years old when he died.
